title: Jordan Peterson Manifest the Reaction against New Atheism
description:
James is a thinker who loves conversation. We struggle with forum for deep open ended public conversation in our culture and perhaps YouTube is filling that void. Our conversation ranged over a number of topics including TS Eliot and modernity. I've already used a clip out of this conversation and I'll likely keep doing so. 

Notes 
Conversations
Audio learning youtube tape
Deconstructing JBP
Why we could hear the bible freshly from JBP
Mythology and endurance of civilization
TS Eliot the four quartets, biographies
Jeremy irons reads TS Eliot
Atheists said the vision
All other groups say “he’s our guy”
Plurality
Vervaeke
Meaning crisis
Atheists trying to promote their totalizing vision and when JBP attacks a multitude unify under him (except the SJW) 

#jordanpeterson #meaningcrisis #tseliot

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/

https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Also on Lbry: https://beta.lbry.tv/@paulvanderklay

Join the Sacramento JBP Meetup https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/
